Your Tug ‘O’ War score has been accepted!
Message:

[Report Message]
Hi cycrosism,

Your score of 4,200 in Tug ‘O’ War has been reviewed and accepted.

You have been awarded 504 neopoints. If you qualified for an avatar, that has also been awarded.

item.title: Ultimate Tug-o-war
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“cycrosism, post:4, topic:210757”]I got 4200 points and at the end it said

Your score is being reviewed by staff. If it is deemed valid, you will receive your neopoints.

Or something like that, what happens if they find i was using scripts? no points?[/quote]
Yeah and maybe your account will be banned.

Read full topic

item.title: Ultimate Tug-o-war
item.dc:creator: @pesky pesky
item.description:
@pesky wrote:

i edited it as for some reason it wasnt working… NEW ONE:

program New;
begin
repeat
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘a’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘s’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘d’));
Sleep(65);
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘a’));
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘w’));
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘s’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘d’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘w’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘a’));
Sleep(65);
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘w’));
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘d’));
until(False);
end.

Read full topic

item.title: Ultimate Tug-o-war
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath_961 Aftermath
item.description:
@Aftermath_961 wrote:

Nice job, it got me 4188 points. I’m gonna try tweaking it to see if I can get 4200.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 02, 2008, 05:30:37 AM[/size][hr]Yup, this did it. I tried just reducing the waits, but when that didn’t work, I took out the W and S keys since this goes so fast you’ll never get to Super Pull.

program New;
begin
ActivateClient;
repeat
KeyDown(GetKeyCode('a'));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode('d'));
Sleep(1);
KeyUp(GetKeyCode('a'));
KeyUp(GetKeyCode('d'));
Sleep(1);
until(IsFKeyDown(7));
end.

Read full topic

item.title: Ultimate Tug-o-war
item.dc:creator: @jac jac
item.description:
@jac wrote:

Delete everything in your scar window and put this in

program New;
begin
ActivateClient;
repeat
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘w’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘a’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘s’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘d’));
Sleep(5);
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘w’));
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘a’));
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘s’));
KeyUp(GetKeyCode(‘d’));
Sleep(5);
until(IsFKeyDown(7));
end.

Now, go to tug-o-war and target the window
Start a game
And run the script

Read full topic
